A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Obviously this wasn't a perfect movie\, specifically around the scene at the casino\, but overall\, this was a great movie. People need to understand that to make a great franchise that should last\, you can't stick to one single theme over and over. I'm glad that they took risks and went off the typical star wars theme because if they did continue to follow that same star wars theme\, the franchise would be slowly digging its grave.
